```lean4
import Mathlib

open Metric Set EuclideanGeometry

/--
Prove that, for all $a > 0$ and $b > 0$, the power series of $e^{ax} \cos (bx)$ with respect to $x$ has either zero or infinitely many zero coefficients.
-/
theorem putnam_1970_a1
(a b : ℝ)
(ha : a > 0)
(hb : b > 0)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(f_def : f = fun x : ℝ => Real.exp (a*x) * Real.cos (b*x))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = f x)
(S : Set ℕ)
(S_def : S = {n : ℕ | p n = 0})
: S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_a1
(a b : ℝ)
(ha : a > 0)
(hb : b > 0)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(f_def : f = fun x : ℝ => Real.exp (a*x) * Real.cos (b*x))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = f x)
(S : Set ℕ)
(S_def : S = {n : ℕ | p n = 0})
: S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
  have step1 : S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
    by_cases h : S = ∅
    · exact Or.inl h
    · right
      have h' : ¬Finite S := by
        rw [Set.not_finite_iff_infinite]
        rw [S_def]
        have h₁ : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball (0 : ℝ) c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n) * x ^ n = f x := hp
        obtain ⟨c, hc, hc'⟩ := h₁
        have h₂ : ∃ n : ℕ, p n = 0 ∧ n ∈ S := by
          by_contra! h₃
          have h₄ : S = ∅ := by
            apply Set.eq_empty_of_forall fun n =>
            by_contra hn
            have h₅ := h₃ n
            aesop
          aesop
        obtain ⟨n, hn, hn'⟩ := h₂
        have h₃ : Infinite S := by
          apply Set.infinite_of_injective_forall_mem (fun m n h => by aesop)
          aesop
        aesop
      exact h'
  
  exact step1
```

-/
theorem putnam_1970_a1
(a b : ℝ)
(ha : a > 0)
(hb : b > 0)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(f_def : f = fun x : ℝ => Real.exp (a*x) * Real.cos (b*x))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = f x)

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_a1
(a b : ℝ)
(ha : a > 0)
(hb : b > 0)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(f_def : f = fun x : ℝ => Real.exp (a*x) * Real.cos (b*x))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = f x)
(S : Set ℕ)
(S_def : S = {n : ℕ | p n = 0})
: S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
  have step1 : S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
    by_cases h : S = ∅
    · exact Or.inl h
    · right
      have h' : ¬Finite S := by
        rw [Set.not_finite_iff_infinite]
        have h₁ : S ≠ ∅ := h
        have h₂ : ∃ n : ℕ, n ∈ S := Set.nonempty_iff_ne_empty.mpr h₁
        obtain ⟨n, hn⟩ := h₂
        have h₃ : ∀ n : ℕ, n ∈ S → n ∈ S := by simp_all
        exact Set.infinite_of_injective_forall_mem (fun a b h => by aesop) h₃
      exact h'
  
  simpa [S_def, f_def] using step1

(a b : ℝ)
(ha : a > 0)
(hb : b > 0)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(f_def : f = fun x : ℝ => Real.exp (a*x) * Real.cos (b*x))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = f x)
(S : Set ℕ)

: S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by

(hb : b > 0)

(p : ℕ → ℝ)

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_a1
(a b : ℝ)
(ha : a > 0)
(hb : b > 0)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(f_def : f = fun x : ℝ => Real.exp (a*x) * Real.cos (b*x))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = f x)
(S : Set ℕ)
(S_def : S = {n : ℕ | p n = 0})
: S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
  have h1 : S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
    by_cases h2 : S = ∅
    · exact Or.inl h2
    · apply Or.inr
      have h3 : ¬Finite S := by
        have h4 : S = {n : ℕ | p n = 0} := S_def
        rw [h4]
        have h5 : ¬Finite {n : ℕ | p n = 0} := by
          intro h6
          have h7 : ∃ n : ℕ, p n ≠ 0 := by
            by_contra h8
            have h9 : ∀ n : ℕ, p n = 0 := by
              intro n
              by_cases h10 : n ∈ Set.univ
              <;> simp_all
            have h11 : p = fun n => 0 := by
              ext n
              exact h9 n
            have h12 := hp
            simp_all [f_def, Real.exp_ne_zero]
            <;> aesop
          cases' h7 with n hn
          have h13 : n ∈ {n : ℕ | p n = 0} := by simp_all
          exact hn (by aesop)
        exact h5
      exact h3
  exact h1
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1970_a1
(a b : ℝ)
(ha : a > 0)
(hb : b > 0)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(f_def : f = fun x : ℝ => Real.exp (a*x) * Real.cos (b*x))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = f x)
(S : Set ℕ)
(S_def : S = {n : ℕ | p n = 0})
: S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
  have step1 : S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
    by_cases h : S = ∅
    · exact Or.inl h
    · right
      have h' : ¬Finite S := by
        have h1 : S = {n : ℕ | p n = 0} := S_def
        rw [h1]
        have h2 : ¬Finite {n : ℕ | p n = 0} := by
          intro hf
          have h3 : ∃ n : ℕ, p n ≠ 0 := by
            by_contra! h4
            have h5 : p = fun n => 0 := funext h4
            have h6 := hp
            rcases h6 with ⟨c, hc, hc'⟩
            have h7 := hc' 0
            simp [f_def, h5] at h7
            have h8 : ∑' n : ℕ, (0 : ℝ) * (0 : ℝ) ^ n = 1 := by simp_all [Real.exp_zero]
            norm_num at h8 <;> linarith
          rcases h3 with ⟨n, hn⟩
          have h4 := hf
          simp_all [Set.finite_singleton]
          <;> aesop
        exact h2
      exact h'
  
  apply step1

theorem putnam_1970_a1
(a b : ℝ)
(ha : a > 0)
(hb : b > 0)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(f_def : f = fun x : ℝ => Real.exp (a*x) * Real.cos (b*x))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = f x)
(S : Set ℕ)
(S_def : S = {n : ℕ | p n = 0})
: S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
  have step1 : S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S := by
    have h₁ := hp
    rcases h₁ with ⟨c, hc, hc'⟩
    have h₂ := hc' 0
    have h₃ := hc' (c / 2)
    have h₄ := hc' (-c / 2)
    simp [f_def, Real.exp_zero, Real.cos_zero, pow_zero, tsum_eq_single 0] at h₂ h₃ h₄
    <;> norm_num at h₂ h₃ h₄ <;>
    (try simp_all [S_def, Set.ext_iff]) <;>
    (try ring_nf at * ) <;>
    (try field_simp [Real.exp_ne_zero] at * ) <;>
    (try norm_num at * ) <;>
    (try aesop) <;>
    (try

      aesop) <;>
    (try
      simp_all [Set.ext_iff, Set.mem_setOf_eq, Set.mem_empty_iff_false, iff_false_iff] <;>
      aesop) <;>
    (try
      aesop) <;>
    (try
      aesop)
  
  simpa using step1
